data.title: Argentina match schedule 2024: Lionel Messi national football team next games, fixtures after Copa America triumph
data.meta_description: As reigning champions on the continental and global stage, 2024 will be an important year for Argentina as they hope to secure one major title and set themselves up to defend the other.
data.text:
As reigning champions on both the continental and global stage, 2024 is an important year for Argentina that has already seen them defend their Copa America title.

Lionel Messi continues to add milestones and silverware to his legendary career, leading Argentina to new and greater heights almost every time he takes the field.

However, that has built expectations to nearly unmatched levels, and the team will have the weight of trophies on their shoulders as they progress forward in each and every match throughout the year/

With uncertainty at the head coaching position thanks to questions regarding Lionel Scaloni's future, Argentina entered 2024 with much to gain but also plenty to lose.

Here is a breakdown of their coming games for the remainder of the year.

Argentina match schedule 2024: Fixtures, results

Lionel Messi and Argentina will remain the hottest ticket in town as the 2024 Copa America winners see out the rest of the year with several high profile matches.

Argentina also must continue to work through a competitive 2026 World Cup qualifying tournament, sitting atop the standings but under pressure from a resurgent Uruguay and Colombia.

Argentina in CONMEBOL 2026 World Cup qualifying

Argentina sit atop the World Cup qualifying standings through six matches but suffered their first defeat in over a year when they fell to Uruguay in November of 2023, leaving them looking over their shoulder.

For the 2026 World Cup's expanded field, the top six teams in CONMEBOL qualification earn automatic qualification to the competition, while the seventh-place finisher advances to the latest iteration of the intercontinental playoffs.

*Updated as of latest matches on November 22, 2023.
